main event: Mr. and Mrs. Sallie White reported seeing strange glowing objects in the sky over Warrenton, North Carolina, on October 26, 1950.
interesting points: The objects were described as round and glowing with a bluish color., They appeared to fly in formation and executed evasive maneuvers., Witnesses reported that the objects would suddenly vanish and reappear at different points in the sky., Other couples also reported seeing the same unusual objects in the vicinity., This sighting was part of a larger wave of 'flying saucer' activity reported across North Carolina during this period.
sighted object: strange glowing objects in the sky
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Sallie White and Mr. and Mrs. Boyce
